sentences.en: And yet, I despise your world, I hate your carpet and your refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 还有，我对你的世界充满鄙视。我恨你的地毯，你的冰箱。

sentences.en: Brody reached into the refrigerator and pulled out a beer.
sentences.cn: 布罗迪把手伸进冰箱,拿出一罐啤酒.

sentences.en: Elizabeth:Do you mean to tell me you have all of those drinks in your refrigerator?
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白：你的意思是告诉我你在冰箱里有所有的饮料? ?。

sentences.en: He collected some orange juice from the refrigerator and, glass in hand, strolled to the kitchen window.
sentences.cn: 他从冰箱里拿了点橘子汁，然后手拿杯子溜达到厨房的窗口。

sentences.en: He took the liberty of using my refrigerator while I was away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候他擅自使用了我的冰箱.

sentences.en: He went to the refrigerator and removed a bottle of wine.
sentences.cn: 他走到冰箱处拿出一瓶酒。

sentences.en: His refrigerator frequently looked half empty.
sentences.cn: 他的冰箱里经常半空着。

sentences.en: Invariably, he keeps the refrigerator well stocked.
sentences.cn: 他总是把冰箱塞得满满的。

sentences.en: It has a refrigerator, a freezer, an electric stove and a dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 这里有电冰箱 、 冷冻机 、 电炉和洗碗机.

sentences.en: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

sentences.en: Marianne went to rummage in the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安娜在冰箱里翻了翻。

sentences.en: My parents can't even afford a new refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 我父母甚至买不起一台新冰箱。

sentences.en: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.en: She traded in her old refrigerator for a new one.
sentences.cn: 她以旧冰箱折价添钱买了一台新冰箱。

sentences.en: Take the beef out of the refrigerator to defrost.
sentences.cn: 把牛肉从冰箱里拿出来解冻。

sentences.en: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.en: There are plenty of sodas in the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 冰箱里有很多碳酸饮料。

sentences.en: This dessert can be served straight from the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 这甜点从冰箱里拿出后即可食用。

sentences.en: This is the right fuse for the refrigerator.
sentences.cn: 这是电冰箱上使用的保险丝.

sentences.en: This refrigerator is fabricated from parts made in different factories.
sentences.cn: 这台电冰箱是由不同的工厂所制的零件组装的.

sentences.en: Wade walked quickly to the refrigerator and pulled out another beer.
sentences.cn: 韦德快步走到冰箱边又拿出一罐啤酒。

sentences.en: What would your refrigerator say if it could talk?
sentences.cn: 如果你的冰箱可以说话，它会说什么?。

sentences.en: Whatever is left over may be put into the refrigerator, where it will keep for 2-3 weeks.
sentences.cn: 剩下的东西都可以放进冰箱，可以保持两到三个星期不坏。

words.tran_cn: 冷藏（refrigerate的过去分词）；使冷却
冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉

phrases.tran_cn: 吸收式冷冻机；吸收式冰箱

trans.tran_cn: 冰箱，冷藏库，制冰机，冷冻机
trans.tran_en: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool
